article.Heading: Budget 2017: Here are a few expectations from gold industry
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18â€™s Manisha Gupta, Rajesh Khosla, MD at MMTC-PAMP India spoke about what he expects from the Budget and about the importance of GST for the gold industry.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Manisha Gupta, Rajesh Khosla, MD at MMTC-PAMP India spoke about what he expects from the Budget and about the importance of GST for the gold industry.
